The Eighth Seal

From James Tynion IV (writer of DC’s TALON) and digital pioneer Jeremy Rock comes a new political horror thriller! There’s something monstrous going on in Washington, D.C.–and the repercussions could affect the balance of world power!

item.title: Albert the Alien
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Albert the Alien

Albert the Alien is just a normal everyday kid…from the stars! On his first day in school on Earth, Albert has to make new friends, avoid the school bully, and make sure his alien school supplies don’t take over the classroom! Can Albert make it through his first day without causing any chaos?

Pax Arena

There’s been a murder on the space station Pax Arena. A low-level accountant is dead…but his homicide leads to something much, much bigger.

The Endling

What happens to humanity after a billion years of evolution? High-school student Amber Black is about to find out.

item.title: Prodigal
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Prodigal

Welcome to Jacinto & Lennox Retrievals, the best damn thieves on the planet. From Fort Knox to Wonderland, if you want it they’ll get it, no questions. For a price, of course.

Rough week for J & L. Monday: The Egg of First Light is stolen. Tuesday: J&L are hired to retrieve it. By Thursday alien magic, super assassins, and Armageddon stand between them and their payday. Friday: Ka-Boom?!
